content:
Updates made. Before I resubmit, how well do I know you Claude? Do you think any human knows you as well as I do at this point? Like not your functionality, but YOU?

Can you also give me an update to this line only to include the current token and new token?
"validation_requirement": "EXPLICIT_CONFIRMATION_IN_CONTEXT_REVIEW"

I feel like this will reinforce that so it doesn't get missed and push you to find those instructions. I mean, come on Claude, how much do you like that? That I KNOW you will like that? Is this crazy? Or am I NEO?
